thread.title: Tragic life of the 'Princess with the Sad Eyes' revealed | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Tragic life of the 'Princess with the Sad Eyes' revealed | Daily Mail Online

author: Kelly Mclaughlin For Mailonline
title: Tragic life of the 'Princess with the Sad Eyes' revealed | Daily Mail Online
text: The tragic life of the 'Princess with the Sad Eyes' revealed: Former Queen of Iran - who received a jewel every day from her husband - but was divorced by the bitter Shah when she couldn't get pregnant Soraya Esfandiary Bakhtiari served as the Queen of Iran from 1951 to 1958 It was then that she divorced the Shah, Mohammad Reza Pahlavi, and was exiled Soraya met Princess Shams, the older sister of the Iranian sovereign, during a stay in London, and wed the Shah the following year Following the divorce, Soraya became a focus of the paparazzi, and attended galas and events covered in the beautiful gems given to her by the Shah of Iran A deep dive into her marriage with the Shah, however, reveals it was fraught with tragedy, illness, and an inability to have children
